scene.name: intro
scene.line: `(A bulky set of black goggles sit on the edge of the table, next to an ashtray, a newspaper, and a few empty glasses.)`
scene.option: Who do you think that belongs to?

scene.name: what
scene.line: Can I tell you a horrible secret? I never wear eye protection in the shop. It's dangerous, I know! But I'm always looking back and forth from my oscilloscope to whatever I'm working on, and the scope has this peculiar kind of hard-bordered glow that I just ...
Well, I've never found a pair of goggles or glasses that doesn't smear out that glow. At best, the lens softens everything so you can't quite find the edges.

scene.name: who
scene.line: Whoever they are, they're gone now. Must have been pretty tanked to leave it behind â€” this thing looks expensive!
